docs.snippet: Jessie Williams Swift, who had been president of the Brooklyn Thoracic Hospital, now part of Brooklyn Hospital, from 1931 to 1947, died yesterday in a nursing home in Trumbull, Conn. She was 100 years old and had lived most of her life in Brooklyn...
docs.lead_paragraph: Jessie Williams Swift, who had been president of the Brooklyn Thoracic Hospital, now part of Brooklyn Hospital, from 1931 to 1947, died yesterday in a nursing home in Trumbull, Conn. She was 100 years old and had lived most of her life in Brooklyn Heights.

docs.snippet: The engagement of Sarah Bell Bullard to Robert Neille Steck, son of Charlotte Steck of San Antonio and the late Oscar Francis Steck, has been announced by her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Lyman G. Bullard of Andover, Mass. A late June wedding is planned....
docs.lead_paragraph: The engagement of Sarah Bell Bullard to Robert Neille Steck, son of Charlotte Steck of San Antonio and the late Oscar Francis Steck, has been announced by her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Lyman G. Bullard of Andover, Mass. A late June wedding is planned.

docs.snippet: Vincent Korda, an Oscar-winning art director for motion pictures and a painter, died Thursday in London. He was 81 years old and lived in England and in Cap d'Antibes, France....
docs.lead_paragraph: Vincent Korda, an Oscar-winning art director for motion pictures and a painter, died Thursday in London. He was 81 years old and lived in England and in Cap d'Antibes, France.
